concept.title: Send Error Report
concept.shortdesc: Clicks on "Send Error Report" button on the Error Reporting dialog box, then you can send the information of assigned error reports to CrashReport@zwcad.comas well as its problemdescriptions.

conbody.p: If the network isn't connecting, a prompt boxpops up telling you that "The error report wasn't sent, please send the file to CrashReport@zwcad.com". Fromthis prompt box, you can see the name of error report file together with its saving path.
Additionally, the user can choose not to send an error report.
